```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
commute <- read_rds("Data/commute.rds")          # import data
states <- c("or", "ak", "ca", "wa", "id", "nv")  # states of interest
commute_nw <- filter(commute, state %in% states) # make df for graphing
```


```{r}
# Charlotte's original graph
ggplot(commute_nw) +
  geom_bar(aes(x = "", y = prop, fill = factor(transport_type)), 
    stat = "identity", width = 1) +
  facet_wrap(~ state_name) +
  coord_polar(theta = "y") +
  theme_minimal(18) + 
  xlab("") + ylab("") +
  theme(axis.text = element_blank())
```
